resources.string: Enter center coordinates and h/w in meters:
Please enter coordinates in lat,lon or NATO MGRS format
No elevation data for the middle of the ocean!
OpenAthena™ for Android is a project which allows common drones to spot precise geodetic locations
ERROR: bad altitude or terrain data. This image is unusable. 🖼🚫🎯
Please ensure your DEM file covers the drone\'s location!
Could not resolve target. Please load a GeoTIFF Digital Elevation Model \".tif\" or DTED2 \".dt2\" file using ⛰ button\n
Unable to open image file to calculate. Drone image 🖼 metadata is either missing or unusable. Is this a drone image? \n
ERROR: failed to load DEM, not a GeoTIFF \".tif\" or DTED2 \".dt2\" file.\n
ERROR: Cannot calculate 🚫🧮: no image 🚫🖼 selected\n
⚠️ DANGER: Autel drones have known accuracy problems ⚠️
Image is too large to show!
DEM loaded successfully! Tap anywhere within the image to calculate coordinates
The widely-used standard for describing a latitude longitude location on Earth
The NATO Military Grid Reference System standard. Describes a 1 meter² area of the Earth
The NATO Military Grid Reference System standard. Describes a 10 meter² area of the Earth
The NATO Military Grid Reference System standard. Describes a 100 meter² area of the Earth
An alternative geodetic system using the Krasovsky 1940 ellipsoid. Commonly used in former Warsaw pact countries
An alternative geodetic system using the Krasovsky 1940 ellipsoid. A Northing defined by X value, and Easting defined by Y value describe an exact position on Earth
⚠️WARNING: values are in WGS84, not CK-42 ⚠\n
ERROR: Latitude metadata not found! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
ERROR: Longitude metadata not found! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
ERROR: Altitude metadata not found! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
ERROR: Azimuth metadata not found! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
ERROR: Camera Pitch metadata not found! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
ERROR: Camera Roll metadata not found!
ERROR: Camera Pitch metadata found, but was invalid! This drone is incompatible with OpenAthena! 😭
Generated by OpenAthena for Android from sUAS data
Step 1: load a Drone Image. 🖼 A Digital Elevation Model (DEM) will automatically download for the surrounding area
Step 2: tap anywhere within the image to calculate ground coordinates
Step 3: obtain your target location below
ERROR: wrong filetype. Please select a GeoTIFF file ending in \".tif\" or DTED2 file ending in \".dt2\"
ERROR: XMP metadata found but was empty!
Critical Error: could not load Earth geoid datafile!
NATO and WGS84 output vertical datum is EGM96 meters (or feet) above mean sea level.
CK-42 output vertical datum is meters height above the Krassowsky 1940 ellipsoid.
Use this to correct bad compass data. This is NOT for setting magnetic declination!
For best results, please calibrate your drone\'s compass 🧭 before flight!
Obtain a Digital Elevation Model Here
Credit Carole Raddato, Statue of Athena wearing a Corinthian helmet. 2014 CC BY-SA 2.0
